responses: Hello!
Good to see you again!
Hi there, how can I help?
Sad to see you go :(
Talk to you later
Goodbye!
Sure, how can I assist you?
Of course! What do you need help with?
I’m here to help. What’s the issue?
Tell me what you need, and I’ll do my best!
Absolutely! Let me know how I can help.
Yes, I’d be happy to assist!

patterns: Can you give me some details?
What do you know about this?
responses: Sure, let me provide you with some details.
What specific information do you need?
I can help with that! Please elaborate.
Let me look into that for you.
Here’s what I know: [provide details].
Of course, what would you like to know?

patterns: I want to hear something funny
responses: Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts!
What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
Why don’t oysters donate to charity? Because they are shellfish!
Why did the bicycle fall over? It was two-tired!
What do you call cheese that isn’t yours? Nacho cheese!
